#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    //freopen("inp.txt", "r", stdin);
    lli t, l, i, j, ans;

    string s;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--) {
        s.clear();
        cin>>s;

        l = s.length();
        ans = 0;
        if (l > 1) {
        if (s[0] != s[1]) {
            ans++;
        }

        for (i = 1; i < l - 1; i++) {
            if ((s[i] != s[i - 1]) && (s[i] != s[i + 1])) {
                ans++;
            }
        }

        if (s[l - 1] != s[l - 2]) {
            ans++;
        }
        } else {
            ans = 1;
        }
        ans = pow(2, ans);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
